thread.title: Stockholm Bullets - Husqvarna falls on profit warning - MarketScreener
thread.title_full: Stockholm Bullets - Husqvarna falls on profit warning - MarketScreener

author: MarketScreener
title: Stockholm Bullets - Husqvarna falls on profit warning - MarketScreener
text:
As expected, the Stockholm Stock Exchange started Tuesday with a decline. In the spotlight is the fact that Husqvarna is once again issuing a profit warning.
After half an hour of trading, the OMXS30 index was down 0.21 percent to 2,612.43. During the day, the index has moved within the range -0.25 percent at its lowest and -0.14 percent at its highest.
The broad OMXSPI was down 0.37 percent.
Share price Price change Commentary Truecaller 0,7% Nordea initiates watch with buy and target price SEK 62 Ratos 0,4% Ratos company Speed signs billion-dollar agreement with Ericsson Afry -0,4% Awarded contract for major pumped storage project in India Boliden -0,8% SHB: The acquisition of Lundin Mining's assets is not considered value-creating Lundin Gold -1,6% Released production forecast for 2025, still expects quarterly dividends of USD 0.20 per share SBB -2,0% Continues to receive more requests from bondholders to accelerate Eurobonds under EMTN programs Lundin Mining -2,8% The divestment of assets to Boliden is deemed value-creating, according to SHB Rusta -1,6% Increased turnover while operating profit decreased, guides for more new openings CTEK -4,8% Terminated cooperation with General Motors regarding customized electric car chargers, takes one-off costs Kjell & Company -5,0% Will do a rights issue, invests in new automated central warehouse Husqvarna -5,3% Profit warning also for the fourth quarter due to challenging market conditions with intensified campaign activities and unfavorable product mix Share Go to the original article .
